<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2776</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Monster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mein Monster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon Monstre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Meu Monster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Mio Monster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τέρας μου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi Monstruo</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A performance assessment task of a writing activity where students are asked to describe a monster while using parts of the body and adjectives</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Leistung Einschätzung Aufgabe einer 
Schreiben Aktivität, in der Kursteilnehmer gebeten werden, ein 
Monster beim Verwenden der Körperteile und Adjektive zu beschreiben</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une évaluation d'exécution chargent d'une
activité d'écriture où des étudiants sont invités à décrire un 
monstre tout en en utilisant des parties du corps et d'adjectifs</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma tarefa da avaliação do desempenho de uma 
atividade da escrita onde os estudantes sejam pedidos para descrever 
um monster ao usar partes do corpo e de adjetivos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'operazione di valutazione di prestazioni di 
un'attività di scrittura dove gli allievi sono chiesti di descrivere 
un monster mentre usando le parti del corpo e degli aggettivi</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια στοιχειώδης εργασία αξιολόγησης της απόδοσης μιας 
δραστηριότητας γραψίματος όπου οι σπουδαστές καλούνται να 
περιγράψουν ένα τέρας χρησιμοποιώντας τα μέρη του σώματος και 
των επιθέτων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una tarea del gravamen del funcionamiento de una 
actividad de la escritura donde piden los estudiantes describir a un 
monstruo mientras que usan a partes del cuerpo y de adjetivos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
